title: UK Social Media Manager Side Hustle: Video Training Course For Beginners Updated | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Video On Demand Courses has updated its training course on how to become a social media consultant in 2024.
Wingham, United Kingdom - October 17, 2024 —
The newly updated video course includes strategies, case studies, and training materials for beginners looking to start a social media consultancy business as a new career or a side hustle.
To find out more, visit https://www.videoondemandcourses.co.uk/opt-in-c0a30ec1-613e-495f-8bf2-0449e6205dae
The materials in the course focus on the early stages of building and marketing a social media consulting service, particularly how to select a niche and platform to operate on. As the instructors explain, the market for freelance content creators has never been larger, and their tips are designed to help those interested get a foothold in the industry.
The course arrives at a time when the majority - approximately 50% - of surveyed UK residents report relying on a side hustle of some kind to supplement their income. Of that group, 75% said that they were selling online or relying otherwise on digital infrastructure as the foundation of their business. Notably, almost all respondents said they would prefer to rely on their side hustle as a full-time source of income.
Social media consulting is an ideal side hustle given that most businesses require digital branding services, and social media marketing can be a more affordable alternative to PPC ad placements. There is a high demand for these services at the moment, with TikTok testimonials growing increasingly popular among small businesses.
The course materials are delivered on a monthly basis, allowing participants time to follow the template and develop their business before the next phase begins. Each stage of the course consists of around 5 short videos which participants can watch at their leisure.
A spokesperson explains further, “It doesn’t matter if you are a complete beginner and haven’t ventured much into social media yourself. Maybe you haven’t even got a Facebook page yet. With this step-by-step, detailed video training you could be ready to start within hours and have this working for you fully in a few short months.”
Those who sign up for the course will also receive a number of bonus training materials, including guides and checklists for entrepreneurs just starting out in the industry. These bonus materials will be made available instantly upon signup, alongside the first monthly video course.
Interested parties can learn more and sign up at https://www.videoondemandcourses.co.uk/how-to-become-a-social-media-consultant
